name: drainpipe
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a pipe that carries waste water or sewage away from buildings
David Crausby/Moment/GettyImages drainpipes [ plural ] UK
trousers that are very tight all the way down the legs: There's an old photo of my dad looking really cool in a pair of drainpipes.
